note.p: Death: Waterford, County Waterford, Ireland (13 May 1740)
Burial: Waterford Cathedral, County Waterford, Ireland
Education: Wadham College, Oxford: BA (1692). St Edmund Hall, Oxford: MA (1695). Christ Church, Oxford: BD (1704). Trinity College, Dublin: DD (1707)

Career: Vice-Principal of St Edmund Hall (1692); Chaplain of Christ Church (1694); Regius Professor of Greek, Oxford (1705-1707); Chaplain to Thomas Herbert, Earl of Pembroke, Lord Lieutenant of Ireland; Bishop of Waterford and of Lismore (1708-death); died of the stone
